categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The impostor Gilad Pellaeon was a double arranged by the Supreme Commander to sleep in his assigned room during the negotiations with Five World Prime Minister Aidel Saxan of the Corellian system in 40 ABY. In the subsequent assassination attempt arranged by Thrackan Sal-Solo, both he and Saxan were killed. The idea for a double had been presented to Pellaeon by General Tycho Celchu, who had thought of it with the help of Wedge Antilles.
